targetLine.text: Hey, you're making yourselves look like fools. Let's be honest, boys. You're never gonna be real scarers. Because real scarers look like us. But hey, if you really want to work for a scare company, they're always... hiring in the mail-room.

contextBefore.text: I want you to stop making us look like fools!

contextAfter.text: Guys! Hold on! Hey, hey, hey, wait a second. Don't listen to him! We just need to keep trying!
No! You need to STOP trying! You can train monsters like this all you want, but you can't change who they are!
Mike. We appreciate everything you've done. But he's right. No matter how much we train, we'll never look like them. We're built...
